note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Commandant
Commandant is a Command Pattern based undo/redo manager, supporting transient, asynchronous and compound actions, with upcoming support for serialisation, edit trees and version tagging.

### Authors and Contributors
Chris Spencer (@c-spencer) (Sysdea)

### License
MIT License
name: Commandant
tagline: An undo/redo manager for JavaScript using the Command Pattern.
